participant_1.background:
I don't talk to my dad because he's a deadbeat, but I love the color pink!
i now live in new mexico.
I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner.
Social media is not my thing.
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.

participant_2.background:
I drive a van because it's spacious and I can take my friends along to watch Scooby Doo at the drive-in theater.
i am a doctor.
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
i have a vacation home in the mountains.
I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment.

content.text: Hey, do you like the color pink?
I love the color pink! It's so vibrant and fun.
Me too! I live in New Mexico now, but I'm originally from California.
Oh nice! I've never been to New Mexico. I'm from Texas.
Cool! I've been to Texas a few times. I have some family there.
What do you do for a living?
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
That sounds really fun! I'm a doctor.
Oh wow! That's amazing. What kind of doctor are you?
I'm a pediatrician. I love working with kids.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're great at your job.
Thanks! I try my best. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Buddy. He's a golden retriever.
Aww, that's so cute! I have a cat named Mittens. She's a tabby.
Nice! I love cats. I'm a little allergic to them, but I still love them.
Aww, that's too bad. Cats are great pets.
Yeah, they are. What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to go to the movies. I also like to read and play video games.
Me too! I love to go to the movies. I also like to read and play video games.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime.
Yeah, that would be fun!
Great! I'll give you my number
